items.title: “It’s a beautiful dream to be alongside my first coach Zaki for the opening of the Moulay Abdellah Stadium. Moroccan fans are eager to see this masterpiece, and this is a historic moment in my coaching career,”

“Amid the relentless violence against the press in Gaza, I have wondered if there is any plausible path to justice,” “After speaking with experts in international humanitarian law, I believe that there is, however tenuous and uncertain”
“Acredito que nos espera muita devastação, mas penso que nos devemos convencer de que eventualmente encontraremos a força interior para sobreviver”
«Una grande emozione consegnare questo riconoscimento in un luogo prestigioso e simbolico come la Sala dei Notari, grazie alla generosa collaborazione del Comune di Perugia»
